aegis.acteval.system module¶

class aegis.acteval.system.System(system_id, system_df, sys_threshold_df)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to representing a system.

system_id the name or id of the system as a string

system_df is a data frame that

has a column trial_id, followed by one column headed with field system_id. Each value is the score of that trial for that system.

threshold_df a three-column data-frame with columns (system_id, threshold, value) that

encodes threshold information. This supports multiple thresholds that can be named when necessary.

add_stratum_index_to_system_data(stratum_ind_df)[source]¶

Adds the stratum_index column to the data frame.

Parameters

stratum_ind_df (pandas.core.frame.DataFrame) – The data frame with columns “trial_id” and “stratum_index”

Returns

sys_df a reference to the modified systems data frame

Return type

pandas.core.frame.DataFrame

confidence_value = 0¶
get_system_tuple()[source]¶

Returns a tuple of system information, useful to convert into a pandas data frame.

Returns

a tuple of system information that can be converted into a data frame.

Return type

tuple
